name: d Louis
text: We are hard-core economic pizza chain people I haven‚Äôt tried this place before. Normally we just do little Caesars. We will be using this place during the pandemic from now on, a little bit more price like one dollar more but everyone uses ‚Ä¶More

name: Cassandra Glover
text: My first time here and I must admit this veggie slice with cheddar butter flavored crust was so good to my tummy. The veggies were cooked and I even added some seasoning to the slice once home. Next time I'll get the garlic butter crust.

name: Jeffrey Gatts
text: Much better experience thank you for addressing the problems from last trip with a phone call and discussing the issues. The wings were great. Thanks. Will be back.

name: Sagar Kakadia
text: Quinton and other dude(sorry forgot the name) hooked me up with a hot box. Thank you!!

name: Lauren Hall
text: Our go to pizza place. The food is tasty (love the crust flavors), customer service is always great, and we can get a large pizza for only $5.99.

name: Gail Mauney
text: Had pizzas delivered to hotel room.  They were hot and arrived sooner than expected. Best pizzas we've had in years.  Staff that took the order and delivery person were both courteous. Highly recommend.

name: Mrs. Bolston
text: Not only is the food good and fast! They have the best customer service and that is a big deal to me as the consumer. ‚ù§‚ù§

name: anthony williams
text: Stop in today to order, sign says no more than 5  people  in @ a time. I was the the only one and none of the employees   Acknowledge  I was there After 5 minutes I walked out due to none service. Definitely not the way to run a business 4/30/2020

name: Jeremy Caswell
text: They lure you in with a 5.99 deal, and you get it thinking you will eat only a couple slices.  Then boom, you ate a whole thin crust pizza.  Good for your taste buds and pocketbook.   Very bad for your diet plans.

name: Nessa Catherine
text:
Yummy subs and salads.  The pepperoni pizza with butter cheese crust is delicious too.
If you have a concern and you feel you haven't been heard, send an email to let them know.  I was very happy with the customer service I received.  Thank you, Howie!

name: Robert Weaver
text: I love this place! Orders are always right and always hot. Thank you!

name: Roy Kelly
text: If you're looking for value pizza and great taste, look no further. The large stuffed crust can't be beat and the taste is above what you would expect of a pizza at the price. My regular pizza is pepperoni and mushrooms, large stuffed crust. Will definitely order more in the future.

name: Dana Escalera
text: I am a delivery driver !!! My granddaughter and I ordered a pick up today ,GREAT FOOD ,GREAT 5 FOR 5 DEAL!!

name: Georgia 3Gunner
text: Love their pizza especially the Asian chicken

name: Adam Nelson
text: Food is excellent, service is questionable. Received a coupon in an e-mail and went inside to order carryout. Cashier could not figure out how to do the coupon. Told me to go outside and order online if I wanted to use the coupon. Before ‚Ä¶More

name: Tina Morales
text: Hands down this is the best pizza place to eat. And great prices.

name: Stacy Nalls
text: I went to there. I ordered the pizza. It looks very good taste. The price deals good.

name: Cindy Santiago
text: Staff is always friendly and my orders are always right. I always ask for 3X the sauce and they never disappoint. With other pizza places I never eat their crust but I always look forward to eating this crust, especially the garlic herb flavor crust. Keep up the awesome service guys!

name: Beverly Brown
text: One of best  pizzas I have tasted in a long time .....from Chicago, home of great food...especially pizza. The crust was awesome !!

name: Norine Mcnally
text: Great food and a friendly staff.  The pizza is great - nice, crispy crust.  We love going here for lunch as its pretty close to the office and they are always quick to serve.  Give 'em a try - it's worth it!

name: Samuel Towery
text: Best pizza around, delivered.

name: James Bryan Turner
text: Good food quickly and at a pretty good price point  coupons are welcome

name: Ted Richey
text: Their pizza is good if you're hungry. Not the worst or the best. Somewhere in between. The flavored crusts are good.

name: MC6 Electric LLC
text: Ordered delivery online just for them to call me after the food was made to say we don't deliver to you, even though they did 2 weeks ago!  Then expected me to come pick it up!  That's the whole point of paying for delivery so I don't have to go get it!  They have lost my business indefinitely!!

name: Melissa Anja Lanakila
text: They messed up the order but corrected it. Just took a bit longer.

name: Michelle Gervais
text: Pizza is pretty good. They get to my house in less than 30 minutes both times we‚Äôve ordered and the drivers have always been pleasant as well. Keep in mind they just opened, too, so don‚Äôt base your decision completely on some of the lower ratings.

name: Steve Stadler
text: great service and good price point for slightly above average pizza. Better than almost every other chain

name: Tumiah Snow
text: My order came a little later than it was suppose to but the delivery girl was so sweet and the food was very good! Keep up the great work you guys!!

name: Craig Brooks
text: The staff here was really nice on my visit. The pizza, as usual for Hungry Howie's, was delicious with my favorite crust flavor of Garlic Herb. Howie's bread wasn't great.

name: Kevin Sims
text: I don't think they should just be a pizza restaurant because the other food that they serve is just as delicious as the pizza itself thumbs up to Hungry Howie's

name: Stephen Jones
text: Great customer service, these ladies in here are working making some good food. Ordering for the whole family tonight. Sorry guys if you work here I didnt see you.

name: Janine Scott-Ford
text: I typically have no complaints with the service or the food at Hungry Howies but tonight was the total opposite.  I called in my order for pick up, I ordered the deal, 2 medium pizzas with 2 topping for $5.99 each.  I order BBQ chicken with ‚Ä¶More

name: matthew jones
text: Busy busy busy need a store a store on southside of Atlanta

name: Janet Aviles
text: The best ....I wish I had one close to home..

name: suzy roscoe
text: Pizza was good, wings were great. Delivery young lady was amazingly fast and friendly

name: Terry mcalpin
text: Had to wait,but we enjoyed the no charge at the end...update....the food was delicious and amazing!!!! I didn't mind paying.but the guys were friendly..we will be bake and we live in Ephesus ga.wish we had a hungry Howie's here but all we have is a store lol

name: Ross Gaudet
text: Pizza is good but my large pizza showed up and it looked like it was shook in the box. A lot of it was on the top of the box and rolled up underneath its self on one side a big mess. Will post pictures when I figure out how. ‚Ä¶More

name: S. Gates
text: Good pizza for great prices!

name: travis downing
text: The absolute worst service... cold and burnt pizza.. wings half done and were willing to do NOTHING. I asked for a phone number so I could talk to someone ‚Äúofficial‚Äù and they said they couldn‚Äôt give me a number... every hungry Howies I‚Äôve ordered from has been phenomenal except for this one!!!

name: Tumiah Snow
text: Every time I come the food is always good and the people are as sweet as can be!!

name: Tammy Banzaca
text: Great food...BUT THE HOWIES APP ON MY PHONE NEVER WORKS RIGHT !

name: Alex Roth
text: People are always kind, pizza is always hot and tastes amazing. Great place!

name: Jeff
text: Why would anyone go here when there are so many good pizza joints around? I'll take a frozen salt pie to go...

name: Courtney Pike
text: I would compare the taste and quality as equivalent to a slightly souped up version of Little Ceasars. It was ok, but it was entirely too greasy in my opinion. I would've given more stars if I wouldn't have started feeling nauseous a couple of hours after eating it. Overall, I most likely wont order from here again.

name: Jessica Holloway
text: Good food nice and friendly staff

name: Neilski Neilski
text: For the price it's good

name: Anthony West
text: Awesomeness. This resturant is the best pizza joint in town at this time and it is also the newest resturant in the city of Newnan, Georgia. The parking lot is large and has plenty of free and handicap parking spaces. The employee's are ‚Ä¶More

name: T Foster
text: It was okay

name: Grace Sacon Mena
text: Their staff should be retrained they are always giving a different amounts for pick up orders then what the total should be. I am done with this place goodbye!!!

name: Tyler Lawler
text: Kindly asked to see the box for the 10" pizza for reference as to not order one too big, as I do not eat pizza very often. I heard the lady in the back make a snide remark to the cashier as they shared a chuckle. Customer service is everything to me and I was not happy. The food will have to be spectacular for me to return.

name: Kathleen Woodruff
text: My favorite pizza place

text: Great pizza for a great price! The thin crust was really thin and tasted really good too!
